# Foxtra AI Website - llms.txt

## About Foxtra AI
Foxtra AI is a modern AI-powered web development company founded in 2019. We specialize in building cutting-edge AI solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve more. Our mission is to create innovative AI solutions, and our vision is a world where AI seamlessly integrates with everyday applications to enhance productivity and creativity.

## Company Stats
- Founded: 2025
- Happy Clients: 100+
- Team Members: 10+
- Success Rate: 99%

## Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 14 with App Router and Server Components
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS (utility-first CSS framework)
- **Database**: MongoDB with Mongoose ODM
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Additional**: React, Framer Motion, Three.js, Retell AI SDK

## Services Offered

### AI Services
- AI Chat Agent Development
- AI SEO Solutions
- AI Voice Agent Development
- AI Website Development
- Blog Article Writing (AI-powered)

### Development Services
- Custom Web Development
- Mobile App Development
- API Development
- Cloud Management
- Automations (using n8n)

### Marketing Services
- Email Marketing
- SMS Marketing
- Video Marketing
- Social Media Management
- Social Media Ads
- Google Ads

## Industry Solutions
We provide specialized solutions for various industries:
- Accountants
- Car Mechanics
- Car Wash Services
- Childcare
- Electricians
- Lawyers
- Medical Practices
- Pest Control
- Plumbers
- Real Estate

## Website Structure

### Main Pages
- Home (/)

- Services (/services)
- Pricing (/pricing)
- Case Studies (/case-studies)
- Blog (/blog)
- Contact (/contact)
- Showcase (/showcase)

- Fixed Price (/pricing/fixed-price)

- Privacy Policy (/privacy)

- Cookie Policy (/cookies)
- Accessibility (/accessibility)


## Key Features
- Modern React-based UI with TypeScript
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- AI-powered chat functionality
- Case study showcases
- Client testimonials
- Interactive demos and showcases
- WebGL demonstrations
- Blog with article management
- Contact and booking systems

- Jith from Dreamrise

- Sid from Realnest
- Vunnam from VHT

## Content Management
- Blog articles with dynamic routing
- Case studies with detailed project information
- Service pages with comprehensive descriptions
- Interactive demos and showcases
- Client portfolio and testimonials

This website serves as a comprehensive platform for Foxtra AI's services, showcasing their expertise in AI development, web development, and digital marketing solutions across various industries.
